contents.text: Welcome to Homebase, the San Francisco-based solution for free employee scheduling, timesheets, time clocks, and hiring support.
For assistance with scheduling, timesheets, or time clock questions, press '1'.
For help creating or adjusting your employee schedule, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a scheduling specialist.

navigationGoals: Update my staff’s schedule to accommodate last-minute shift changes
I need to adjust my upcoming work schedule to accommodate my VA medical appointments.
I’d like to configure and optimize recurring shift templates for my team.
I’m not sure how to update my staff schedule for next week and need help.
I need to update my upcoming work shifts to fit my revised lab schedule.

contents.text: For questions about timesheet entries or clock-in issues, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with a timekeeping expert.

navigationGoals: Resolve discrepancies in employees’ clock-in and clock-out records
I need help correcting a missing clock-in from yesterday’s shift on my timesheet.
I need to troubleshoot mismatched clock-in timestamps and sync them with payroll.
I need help correcting my timesheet because I entered the wrong clock-in time.
I need help correcting a missing clock-out entry from my shift last week.

contents.text: For help with hiring, recruiting, or onboarding new staff, press '2'.
For posting job openings and tracking applicants, press '1'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our recruitment team.

navigationGoals: Post a new job opening and review incoming applications
I want to post a new job opening for a part-time security role, prioritizing candidates with military experience.
I want to automate job postings to multiple boards and track candidate pipelines.
I want to post a new job opening and track the applicants.
I want to post a new research assistant opening and review the applicants.

contents.text: For onboarding guidance and hiring process support, press '2'.
Please hold while we route your call to our hiring support specialists.

navigationGoals: Organize onboarding steps for a newly hired team member
I need guidance on the onboarding process for my newly hired veteran employees.
I need to set up onboarding workflows and assign role-based permissions for new hires.
I need step-by-step guidance on onboarding my newly hired employee.
I need guidance on completing onboarding tasks for my new lab assistant.
